mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (userId, userPwd, userName, userNumber, userNickname, userAddr, userEmail, userGender, userHeight, userWeight, userForm, userCash) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPwd}, #{userName}, #{userNumber}, #{userNickname}, #{userAddr}, #{userEmail}, #{userGender}, #{userHeight}, #{userWeight}, #{userForm}, #{userCash})
